comment.author: 21734563@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Veterans of the American Civil War, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 66818854@N04
comment._content: She is the USS Atlanta in Federal Naval Service at this point. A magnificent picture!

comment.author: 66406516@N08
comment._content: Before starting her career as an ironclad gunboat, the Atlanta was the blockade runner, Fingal.
